name: Flutterby Me Jewellery
description: Bespoke, handmade beaded jewellery, including necklaces, bracelets, rings, earrings, key rings, hand bag charms, wine glass charms, hair clips or anything else that can be made with beads. Ready made items available straight away or message me with any requests and I can make something to suit your needs. Based in Walmer, free delivery within Deal and a personal note can be included.
safetyTips: Please contact directly with any safety concerns
